exceptions.tactic: intros K a u n m.
intros K' a u n m.

exceptions.exn: The LHS of Ring.ax5 (Ring.mult _ _ _ (plus _ _)) does not match any subterm of the goal

In environment K : Ring a : K u : nat -> K n, m : nat Unable to unify "iter_nat plus zero (fun k : nat => Ring.mult (AbelianGroup.Pack K (Ring.class K) K) (Ring.class K) (u k) a) n m" with "Ring.mult (AbelianGroup.Pack K (Ring.class K) K) (Ring.class K) (iter_nat plus zero u n m) a".

original: intros K a u n m. unfold sum_n_m. unfold mult. symmetry. rewrite Ring.ax5. reflexivity.
